title: Christoph Scheuch
text:
I’m a freelance creator specializing in interactive dashboards, automated reports, custom packages, and tailored workshops using R and Python, working under the Tidy Intelligence brand.
I co-created the open-source projects Tidy Finance and EconDataverse to foster reproducible research in finance and economics.
I’m affiliated with the Finance Group at Humboldt-University of Berlin and Data Editor at the Review of Financial Studies.
